xml2rdf.configuration

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • xml2rdf.configuration.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    The object of settings which can load settings from indicated configuration files (default file name: default.conf)
    Author:
    Jyun-Yao Huang (Allen; allen501pc@gmail.com)

      • Load

        public static void Load()
        If the configuration files are not set, load default configuration file : deafult.conf. Otherwise, loaded the files that users indicate.

      • ReLoad

        public static void ReLoad()
        To reload the configuration files.

      • IsLoaded

        public static boolean IsLoaded()
        Check the configuration files are loaded or not.
        Returns:
        true for success, otherwise false.

      • ShowConfigurationFiles

        public static java.lang.String ShowConfigurationFiles()
        Show the configuration files.
        Returns:
